website_summaries.verdict: Whether you need a tote that goes with any outfit or your main concerns are durability and spaciousness, this bag has it all.
pros: Sports features that make this tote the most versatile on our list, including attractive looks, ample pockets, 15-inch depth, and strong waterproof nylon construction
Includes a wristlet that is easy to detach
cons: Rare concerns about the longevity of the handle stitching, but many more happy owners who are impressed with the overall quality

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that this bag would almost be too big but it was the PERFECT size! It fits my cooler packed lunch (~6.5in wide when full) and even my computer or a few notebooks next to it. Also plenty of space for my hydroflask, travel coffee mug, computer charger and other miscellaneous items as well! I was also worried that the straps might not be sturdy/strong enough for how much weight I was planning on putting in it on a daily basis, but the straps are leather with what looks like very sturdy stitching. Excited to break it in!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect daily travel or work bag!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly the same as the picture. I expected it to be a bit smaller but it was true to size and all the other descriptions. Definitely recommend this bag!! Last time I bought a spacious bag like this for work was a diaper bag but very trendy looking that you can’t tell it’s a diaper bag. And then I saw this one and fell in love!!
customer_reviews.author: aieuo

customer_reviews.title: I like the nylon material and I love that it zips
customer_reviews.text: I’m a teacher and I bought this bag for work. I like the nylon material and I love that it zips! It’s perfect for when it’s raining and I don’t want my papers to get wet. It fits my lap top, papers, wallet, and a few other things comfortably. It also looks really great! This is an awesome teacher bag and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: M.Flowers

customer_reviews.title: My go to bag for everything
customer_reviews.text: Just as nice as I thought. This a large tote bag that is my go to when I walk out the door. It holds my visor, earmuffs, large wallet, water bottle, some food items with room to spare when I go to the market. I don't forget anything when I walk out the door. I can place my keys in the side zipper pocket and always know where they are. I also purchased this insert to keep these things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Watercolor Painter

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has a real bottom
customer_reviews.text: This works well as a tote bag for work, or for travel. It's attractive and lightweight. I like that it has a real bottom, and pockets inside and out. Just wish the straps were a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Pearls Two

customer_reviews.title: So roomy and straps aren’t too short!!
customer_reviews.text: The straps are long enough to put on my shoulder with one hand. It seems well made and I LOVE IT! Two pouches inside, the large pocket zips shut, one zipper pocket inside and one outside. And it stands on its own. My dream bag. I’m using this as a diaper bag/purse for one older kiddo and a baby. Right now I have a wallet, several snacks, a nursing cover, 6 diapers, wipes, tissues, and other random things. Since the empty purse isn’t heavy, this won’t kill my back. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: KR1983

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because the strap on my old work bag ripped and I needed a new one ASAP. I didn't have high expectations but I love it!!! I've only been carrying it for about a month but so far the quality seems much better than I expected. It's a great size, not too big but still holds a ton. Note that it does NOT have a sleeve to stick a laptop in, so I had to buy a separate laptop sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: For less than 3 months a 5 star purchase, then the strap broke. It's now +$30 down the drain.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is stylish and a great size for business and urban life; plus there were several great reviews, so I jumped to buy it on a lightening deal. Between its arrival at the end of March and June 7th, it was also utilitarian. Then the strap broke. Since the straps circumvent the girth of the bag and it is marketed to be used for a laptop, I expected that it was designed to last. I'm very disappointed that this lovely bag is now only good for the landfill. What a waste of money and landfill space.
customer_reviews.author: Mela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tote
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is by far my favorite light weight tote bag! I have owned about five different ones over the years for work use and daily hangout casual wearing. I always want my bag to be at least water resistant and this one does the perfect job done while attached inside a roomy small purse. Which I can’t love it more. It has card slots and other different small compartments. The shoulder straps don’t slide off easily, they’re pretty sturdy. For this price with this quality I would give it six stars.
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for carrying laptops/books.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for students who have to carry any kind of laptop in addition to books on a regular basis. The nylon material and straps feel strong, the bag is roomy, and the extra compartments are good for small accessories. In mine I carry two folders, one single subject notebook, a 15.6 inch laptop, charger, wireless mouse, staples, paperback textbook, moleskine planner, pencil bag, ti-83 calculator, and the accompanying clutch bag. Bonus: the clutch purse has six card slots!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Everything but the kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go anywhere and have anything bag. For work and for church, which is when I have my big bible and notebook. Never have to take anything out to make it all fit. I even have a crossbody bag in there for getting out and running into a restaurant or store and leave the the big bag behind. Well made and goes with anything!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this duo
customer_reviews.text: This nylon bag, with its accompanying smaller bag inside, suits my career needs very well. It's very lightweight and holds everything! The straps seem strong. I like that the top zips completely closed. I've gotten many compliments on it. When I just want to run into the store, I take the wristlet only, which holds my phone, a little make up and my wallet items. I'm very happy with my choice on this. There were so many to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: Kts

customer_reviews.title: Versatile tote, durable and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a decent sized tote to use on a trip to Europe, and happened upon this one. It is well made, and very versatile. I used it as a carry-on and it easily fit some clothes, a kindle, medications and toiletries. As a bag to sling over my shoulder on our adventures, it really fit the bill. The included clutch sized wallet got a bunch of use, also. Would highly recommend this tote!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hemedinger

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality/Beautiful Bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect work/travel bag. The quality is up there with much more expensive brands, but is still very light weight. I can carry it by the handles without dragging it on the ground and it easily fits slung over my shoulder as well (and I’m large). I placed a felt separator inside to organize my items and it couldn’t be more perfect for getting things out of without having to dig for ages. And it zips!!! I loved this bag so much that I ordered another exactly the same. It’s sturdy enough for work and travel, but elegant enough to go out as well. Both came fast and were packed with obvious care. I may just buy more as gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: H Shore

customer_reviews.title: Great for work! Nice, stylish bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality work bag. I carry a planner, some folders, note books and books, umbrella every day and this holds everything well. Has a convenient zipper pocket on the outside, and inside. It also comes with a smaller black clutch that clips into the inside handle. I haven't used that yet, but its quite nice to have. Material seems somewhat resistant to water, but I haven't fully tried that out yet. Im sure sooner or later though I will find out. Overall, I was pleasantly surprised with how nice it was; nice leather handles and detailing.
customer_reviews.author: MrsM2004

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate! It really
customer_reviews.text: After I ordered this shoulder bag I started second guessing myself thinking it would be a bit too big for me to pack around. It’s not. It’s perfect! I put 2-3 folders of paperwork in it when I go to meetings, plus my wallet and water bottle and I have room to spare. It would be great for travel too. It is very nice looking and extremely well made. I highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: debiwebi

customer_reviews.title: Great for work and travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a work trip. I now use it every day! It fits my water bottle, coffee Thermos, any papers I have to take in, and all the random purse-stuff I need throughout the week. I can pack it super full when we're traveling. I use it all the time. It is super sturdy, even when carrying heavy stuff. I've never been concerned about the straps. And it looks good and stays sharp; it doesn't show wear. I am really glad I got this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I had a Long Champ bag, but hated that it didn't have pockets, but loved the lightweight and shoulder room. This is definitely close and has all the pockets! I can also fit my laptop in, if needed, with plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So I work between several public schools and sometimes have to put my bag down in some questionable places. For that reason, I never carry designer type bags and would rather carry comething more practical. This bag is awesome such that it looks classy and comes at a very reasonable price that I dont have to worry about mishandling it. Its a very simple bag but looks polished and have gotten compliments from others.
customer_reviews.author: 808bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Grad Student
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Originally purchased this to carry my laptop and books for school. Ended up using it as an everyday purse as well. I throw everything in this bag and I am set for the day. The little hand bag it comes with is an extra bonus that lets me store my makeup in one place. Great buy and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this bag for doing Home Health visits and I love that I can wipe down the bag with a sanitizer/alcohol/Lysol wipe. I also love how it looks when I've zipped it up and carrying it. Very happy about the extra removable bag inside as well. What would make this the perfect bag for me? A longer zip up compartment inside big enough to place my blood pressure cuff in it after use. (Health department regulations) I can just use a gallon size zip lock instead. Not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Shenanigans

customer_reviews.title: Looks higher quality than the price. Great VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Love This BAG! Solid, good form, zipper perfect for travel under seat of airplane. Handles are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Gerrish

customer_reviews.title: Best tote bag i've had so far
customer_reviews.text: Wow this bag is awesome. I've had it for a month or so and it's been through days of rough usage, being tossed around at home, work, in the car. And it still looks great. It doesn't stain. The handles are hardy and it fits everrrrything (I carry a laptop, water bottle, makeup bag, keys, other junk). It looks professional and classy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for work to carry my laptop, lunch, umbrella, sweater and anything else I might need. It's very roomy and I never have issues fitting my belongings in the bag. It doesn't have padding since it's not advertised as a laptop bag so you do have to be careful when setting the bag down so you don't damage your laptop but I knew that when I bought it. I still love it. The straps are sturdy and I've used it for a while now with no issues in quality. The bottom is flat with 4 little knobs on it so it stands up on its own and the material is super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: KLW

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this bag. Lots of convenient storage space for what I need it for. I can fit my laptop, books/binders, and whatever else I need for the day. I'm also a fan of the additional wristlet which also comes with a lot of storage. P.s. I love purple color! I'm normally a black/brown/gray type of person, but I decided to try something different and glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Could use a structured bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. I haven't had a chance to use it yet, but school starts next week, so we'll see if it lives up to this teacher's demands. I love that it's waterproof and has a zip top. One thing it lacks is a firm bottom to make it stand up on its own for easy packing. But I fashioned one easily with cardboard. Again, we'll see. It's attractive and seems sturdy. Love the ample room inside.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bollinger

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for commuters
customer_reviews.text: This was a great replacement for the backpack I'd been using before. I commute via metro every day, so it's important for me to be able take everything I need in the fewest bags possible. This bag fits almost everything I need. I've fit my planner, pencil case, wallet, book, gym clothes, and bike shoes in it all at once. It can be a bit of a tight squeeze, and I could do with the slightest bit more room, but for the price you can't beat it. The water-resistant shell is a nice feature too, and it looks very professional.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gump

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, durable, beautiful, and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the bag to end all bags....I really cannot stress enough how amazing this bag has already been for me! Keeps all my containers and work things organized cleanly, wicks away moisture and has a durable fabric, and it doesn’t even feel like anything once it’s on your shoulder. Not an obnoxious size but still fits smaller laptop and my iPad along with other notebooks and even a water bottle. Smaller bag inside of it is incredibly convenient to take around to run errands. Favorite part = the attached keychain! Now I’m not hunting for my keys all the time......
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised with the quality of this bag compared to the price. I had been looking for a work bag large enough to hold my laptop, but couldn't find one I liked. Not even at high end stores. I decided to purchase this one to "get me through" until I found one I liked. I ended the search as this one has really done it's job well. The zipper across the top has been really helpful keeping everything dry during rainy commutes, and the bag holds a lot. The bonus clutch has turned into my new wallet that moves from bag to bag too. I'm hoping this one sticks around for a while!!
customer_reviews.author: amylynn

customer_reviews.title: SO much smaller than pictured and described!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very stylish HOWEVER it is nowhere near as large as pictured or described. It doesn't even fit a 1" binder without sticking out. I thought this would be the perfect teaching bag as per the description and other reviews but this isn't it. If you only need to carry a few small things then this would be great but if you're looking for a bag to hold papers, books, laptop, etc. then this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and durable. I use this bag daily back ...
customer_reviews.text: Spacious and durable. I use this bag daily back and forth to work. It holds everything while keeping it organized. The material just wipes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Koll

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag I love it. It is very expensive looking and classy.People thought it was a certain designer that makes bags similar to this one. This bag is made better than the designer bag. i bought the designer bag earlier this year use it a few times it looks bad. I paid 3 figures for it. This is a quality bag buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Reginab488

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is nice and wide, so its easy for me to find my items without digging around in the dark. The zipper pocket on the outside and inside as well as the interior pockets are just big enough to hold your important items like keys and a phone without them toppling out. I do wish there was a zipper, which is the only reason why I took off a star. I would repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made tote!
customer_reviews.text: High end bag with beautiful leather accents. Comes in a nice satchel for storing the bag. I am quite pleased with my purchase and will use this for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest tote bag. It is so roomy and fits well on my shoulder and against my body. The only con would be the strong odor of the material when you first open the wrapper which is around it. Leave it in the open for a day - it airs out - and the odor disappears. Other than that, I highly recommend it if you like toting stuff around.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a bag to haul all the things I carry to and from work. Found it! The bag is really cute, I have received lots of compliments. It is roomy enough to fit my laptop, lunch bag, change of shoes, curling iron, make up bag, water bottle, and a sweater! It does have a zipper but needless to say, I rarely close it. Also super important, the handles are just the right size so the bag does not fall off my shoulder. Handles are leather and the bag is beautifully made. So the days of me carrying 6 different bags are over! Bye reusable shopping bags, hello stylish work tote!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent bag/tote!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I never write reviews, but this product deserves a raving review! This bag is so well made with such quality materials and workmanship. It is very roomy, the zippers work smoothly, and the shoulder straps are sturdy as well as comfortable. The rosy brown/brown color looks very professional and classy. The smaller bag that comes with it, is one of the reasons I chose this particular bag, and I love it, too! I walk several city blocks to my office, and this bag has been the perfect one for me. I am very, very pleased with my bag!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Reader

customer_reviews.title: It has been holding up to the daily abuse of life and looking good while doing it
customer_reviews.text: This has become my daily bag. It has been holding up to the daily abuse of life and looking good while doing it. It a wide open bag with 3 small inner pockets and 1 outer pocket the bag does zip closed which is awesome. The best part is the small clutch/pouch that comes with it. It is removable and can be carried on its own or used to secure things inside. I love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: BlackRose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a new job about a month ago. I carry my 13” MacBook, 2-3 notebooks, 8 folders, my laptop charger, and various other items. If fits everything and it has been incredibly sturdy. I can’t zip it with all of those items in it but from time to time I work at Starbucks and will zip it once my laptop is out and it closes well. I love the inner pocket and outer zipper. I also LOVE the wristlet that it came with. I carry my MacBook charger in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara J.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile bag at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was in the market for. I needed a big bag for work. I can fit my laptop, wallet, coffee mug, lunch bag and so much more. It does get geavy but that’s to be expected. I like the key clip on the inside, so it’s easy to find them when your walking to your car. The other plus is im mom of two, so I can easily pull out my work stuff and through things in for the kids and be on my way.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great purse, nice looking and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I adore this purse. This is literally the only purse I've had that stays organized. All my little bags and pouches fit in here nicely and everything is easy to find. I love the outside, it is easy to keep clean, I wipe it down with a damp cloth and it works great. I use it everyday and it still looks brand new after almost 3 months. I will definitely be ordering again 😊
customer_reviews.author: E. Burt

customer_reviews.title: Actual size is smaller than shown
customer_reviews.text: This size is smaller than advertised. I have been searching for a new work bag and thought I had finally found one that checked all of my boxes: however, the size advertised is NOT correct. The base of the bag is less than 15 inches long- not over 19 inches as advertised. The top of the bag is 19 inches long but it tapers to less than 15 inches at the bottom. I’d encourage the seller to correct the measurements shown. Very disappointed that I wasted my time with ordering this bag.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this bag so far is great. I've been using it for about 2 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bag so far is great. I've been using it for about 2 weeks to carry to and from work. It fits everything I need, has several pockets so things dont get lost in the big bag, and came with a small clutch that I am able to just keep my wallet and keys in and transfer from my purse to my work bag to avoid carrying my purse to work as well. I recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tote
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag all semester at college - it comfortably carries my laptop, a couple of notebooks, a pencil bag, agenda, lotion, tissues, etc... it's a really great tote!! The wallet/wristlet is very cute as well, sleek and I have gotten a few compliments when I use it just by itself.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for work I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new work bag and one that can carry a lot (I’m a nurse practitioner at a hospital and work 12 hour shifts). This easily fits 2-3 tupperware containers for meals, my water bottle, and a coffee mug. And doesn’t appear bulky or overpacked. The material is durable and the straps carry that load without an issue. This is the best bag I’ve found for work and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Tote
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Tote. Quality is very good. The pullout clutch is a real perk. The only improvement I would like to see is to make the narrow straps a little wider; especially on the shoulder area. It would be more comfortable with the weight carried in a Tote this large. I still think the product is worthy of five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Rodney

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: My work bag is kind of out of hand with what's in it.. I'm a planner lol. I have everything in there. Umbrella, books, lunch, tampons, supplements, my other purse. The last bag I had was definitely bigger, I struggle to keep all my crap in this. I manage, but sometimes have to carry my lunch separately, and the bag is literally packed-full. It looks nice, but again, it's not really big enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Law

customer_reviews.title: Nice but didn't turn out to be what I really need.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chance to use it yet due to the lockdown. It is a nice bag but I'm still iffy on it. They showed that the handle strap drop was longer than it actually measures. I needed something with a longer drop. Not worth the effort to return over this but I do wish the sellers would be more accurate. Debating on returning tho, but it's hard to find something useable that's this size that doesn't have a one if those large useless center zipper pockets.
customer_reviews.author: voodoo

customer_reviews.title: Nice, spacious and light!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’m a Substitute teacher so I have a lot of things that I need to carry around. This is a very roomy bag and made out of strong fabric that can be easily wiped clean. What I love about this bag the most is that no matter how many things I put in the bag it doesn’t get heavy. I have purchased other bags that get really heavy with a few things and by the end of the day my neck and shoulders are in pain from the weight I’ve been carrying around. It is classy so it goes well with many outfits! I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Ardon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have put this bag through a lot and it still looks great! I run a property preservation company and I'm out in the field a lot. The material is easy to wipe dust and dirt off of and it carries everything I need. I also love the clutch that comes along with it. I have over-stuffed this bag many times and the straps are very sturdy. I would buy this bag again.
customer_reviews.author: AFJones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well made bag! I especially love the clutch. However, I have to return because it's not quite as big as I need. I'm looking for a large bag I can use to tote various things to/from my place of work, and although this bag is awesome, it can't quite fit all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amecha

customer_reviews.title: One very happy teacher!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a teacher who travels to classes all day long. I’ve tried canvas bags but they either tear or get so dirty they are an embarrassment. Through much research I bought this bag. Was trying to go cheaper as like I mentioned I’m a teacher. This bag has been wonderful. It holds a laptop, water thermos, and multiple file folders. Inside pockets holds my phone and incidentals while outside pocket hold various pens, pencils and highlighters. Outside doesn’t show dirt, straps are not fraying like a former designer bag had and fabric easily can be patted dry should it get wet. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey S. Fish

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my job, where I carry lots of paperwork and a 13" laptop back and forth. I didn't have high expectations, but i LOVE this bag. It has great space for everything I need, and zips close so I can keep my work safe if I'm traveling in the rain. I highly recommend it as a work bag.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Albanese

customer_reviews.title: THE ABSOLUTELY PERFECT WORK BAG
customer_reviews.text: I CANNOT EVEN PUT INTO WORDS HOW PERFECT THIS BAG IS! IM A STATE EMPLOYEE AND DO HOME VISITS, THIS MEAN WHEN THE WEATHER IS A MILKION DEGREES, POURING DOWN RAIN OR SNOWING IM DRIVING AND HAVING TO GET IN AND OUT OF IT. THIS HOLD SO MUCH STUFF AND IT IS DEFINITELY HOLDING UP MORE THEN I EVEN THOUGHT IT WOULD. ITS WATERPROOF AND HELPS KEEP DOCUMENTS SAFE! I WILL ABSOLUTELY BUY ANITHER ONE JUST TO HAVE, OUTSIDE OF WORK IT EASILY BECOMES THE PERDECT RUN AROUND BAG. IN LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Luna

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this purse!!! Not heavy at all, very spacious!! I love the extra bag it has inside and you can remove it if you don't want it there... the color is beautiful, easy to clean!! I wished they had in dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahy

customer_reviews.title: It'll be great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 20" tote in Navy. Just what I was looking for! Planning on going to Alaska and finally broke down and get something new. Nice zipper on top and nice compartments. Something that will be used for more than travel!
customer_reviews.author: cold in Wi.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag because it looks nice, but it is a workhorse! I travel a lot and this bag will not wear out, doesn't really get dirty, but can be wiped. It looks like an expensive bag, I really don't understand why anyone would pay for the name brand bags that are not even as nice as this. I bought two- the pink and the black. Love them both! Love the zipper closure! Very comfortable on the shoulder!
customer_reviews.author: smile

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tote size medium range love the little bag inside for keys cards etc. it’s s nice heavy material and you can wipe it off with a damp rag. I put my lunch a small makeup bag and still have room for computer and my water. Might be good to buy 2 so you have another one ready for a gift or yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this bag
customer_reviews.text: love!! i carry a lot of stuff to work with me, so i love the different compartments. the best part is the wallet that comes with it, i put my credit card and toiletries in there. the handles are long and strong enough to walk around! you can wipe the bag off too because of the material. my mom even wants one lol, so I'll be buying one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Shaday Isehenrien

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Work Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a large tote for my work bag. This is the perfect size - it hold all that I need. The straps are the perfect length and very sturdy! It's exactly what I was looking for with pockets galore to keep me organized. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: ashleyangle

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and company!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, it’s spacious and lightweight. Comfortable straps to when carrying it over your shoulders. I purchased this bag a few months ago and the strap tore. I contacted the company and without hesitation sent me a brand new bag. I can’t say enough about this bag, it’s my everyday bag!
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: It came today and I can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.text: My huge laptop fits inside it but it doesn’t have any padding that you would have in a regular laptop bag. I love all the pockets because storage and organization was the issue with my old bag. Also it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Natale

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.  Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This does the job and looks very nice. Holds everything I need it to hold and, when zipped, does a good job of keeping rain out. Haven't had it long enough to know if the handles will take the wear--but so far, so good and it seems they are pretty sturdy. Been using it 3 times a week for nearly 5 months--and I really load it up with heavy books.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: A Teacher’s Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this purse for quite some time now, about 2 years and I use it all the time! As a teacher it’s been through a lot and has carried way more than it probably should, yet it still looks brand new! Perfect for any season and weather, plus came with a couple extra pieces. It’s perfect as a work purse, casual, or combination or both. I love this purse and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Martini

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome!! It holds my computer, work stuff and lunch! I couldn't be happier! I thought it might be a little pricey but SO worth the money! It will stand up after a few uses. Very comfy to carry. Fits nice on the shoulder without sliding off. Fabric is great and straps are very nice! If you want a nice bag get this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purse Holds A Lot
customer_reviews.text: There are many compartments for cell phones, keys, pens, wallets, business cards, cameras, and on. Plus it looks very nice and is a neutral color which can be worn with many outfits. Also you can wash it on delicate in the washing machine!
customer_reviews.author: Louise C Cody

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable Material
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for about maybe some weeks now and I must say I'm in love. The bag is very durable I've put so much stuff inside and im still able to carry it. No threads have popped or the leather on the straps hasn't peeled. Im very satisfied I've even thought about buying another one but didnt color. The black just goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: LiveALilLelo

customer_reviews.title: The bag is beautiful, spacious
customer_reviews.text: It came just as advertised! The bag is beautiful, spacious, and my laptop (plus SO much more) fit in it. The "clutch" that comes with it is also pretty cute--has a zipper on the outside, inside and credit card holders on the inside. I understand what the other reviewers meant by the potent smell though, it smells very "factory-ey" but I am optimistic that it will fade!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mom bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use as my “diaper bag”/purse for when I’m out with my 2 toddlers. The little carry on purse is perfect for wipes and sanitizer and bags that I always need. And the key hook is super helpful. I can wipe it off and it stays on my shoulder easily. It’s a good size too. So far I’m super happy. I just hope the straps hold up.
customer_reviews.author: DeCo

customer_reviews.title: Two years later, it still looks great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased originally for my daughter, who is a teacher, but I loved the look so much, I got one for me. Two years later, I'm still using it daily, and it shows no signs of wear. That's a first for me. Even the handle has not eroded, and that's always the first to go! Though I use it daily as a handbag, I also use it for carry-on when I travel for work once or twice a month, and I stuff it with my laptop and make-up bag, that kind of thing. I've ruined bags that way, expensive bags, but not this one. It's a beast.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett Siter

customer_reviews.title: Functional bag but does not stand on its own
customer_reviews.text: It was functional, wished it had more pockets. It looked good. However, multiple reviews said that this bag stood up and it doesn’t. I take this to a job that requires me to be mobile and as I travel from place to place it’s hard to find a spot for it bc I need to lean it up against something.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and holds everything
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It is water and dirt resistant, has lots of pockets, easily holds a Mac laptop, and is great for flying. I also use it on a daily basis because it holds everything. High quality materials, leather handles, doesn't get damaged with hard use. An excellent product in all respects.
customer_reviews.author: MMT

customer_reviews.title: Stores EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: Great work bag, gym bag, lunch bag cosmetics, wallet and extra all in one! I use it everyday for work. It matches with everything and has a great on the go but sophisticated and still suburban look. I put little bags inside to keep everything separate and the clutch is awesome to hold wallet and keys and I use that when just grabbing coffee or lunch or night time clutch great bag all around. A place for everything. I even carried a gallon of water and the bag holds up!
customer_reviews.author: Ezra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Instructor Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm a relatively young college instructor and I'm big on style in my bag and outfit choices, and this bag has served me well over the past several months. It holds my laptop perfectly and I love that you can zip it close if taking on an airplane. Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Was a great bag until the zipper broke!
customer_reviews.text: This tote worked well and looked great. It wasn't overstuffed or filled with anything too heavy so I was really disappointed when the zipper broke. I don't see a return option...I will reach out to Amazon to see if I still can't get my money back...disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jane A. Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag feels like a cheap $1 bag that you'd get off the wish app. The stitches are already coming undone and I just opened the packaging! Highly upset with the quality of this bag. Definitely not worth $10 let alone the $40 it cost me!
customer_reviews.author: CphpTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Received my bag today and I love it. Very good quality and I was impressed ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my bag today and I love it. Very good quality and I was impressed with the effort company made to ship it safely. It not only came inside a dust bag, but also wrapped carefully in bubble wrap and then in the plastic shipping bag. Zippers all work smoothly and it’s an extremely nice bag, holds a lot of stuff. I just ordered one for my daughter too because these are great for traveling, especially the smaller purse that comes with the bag. That’s great for holding airline tickets, credits cards, etc. and using as a wristlet purse. Very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this tote bag, great quality, perfect amount of pockets. I especially love the matching small pocket bag that comes with it. The zippers all work great, and it looks exactly like it appears online. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ee

customer_reviews.title: use it for school. fits my macbook & 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: use it for school. fits my macbook & 2 large textbooks textbooks. Ive been using it about 6 months and it still looks the same as the day i purchased it
customer_reviews.author: stephers123

customer_reviews.title: Mary Poppins bag for the 21st century!
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily to carry my purse, lunch & etc. to work. Love the exterior- nicely waterproof & spill/stain resistant. The handles fit comfortably in my hand & are flexible without feeling or looking sloppy. The interior purse/clutch and key holder are the perfect size & easily accessible. Throw in the elegant, yet sturdy & substantial feeling gold metal zipper pulls & accents and you have a practically perfect bag@
customer_reviews.author: Shelley L

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this bag - YALUXE is a Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Well made for the price. Really enjoying it. The handle broke after a few months, but the seller YALUXE was very kind with a replacement. I suggest the bag and the seller. Great product and customer service. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: perfect bag for me
customer_reviews.text: I typically buy only leather bags but they become heavy after awhile. This bag is large enough to hold all my items, light enough and has adequate compartments. I've had this bag a little over a week, but it appears it is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and great for a work bag. You can carry ALL your essentials.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is only about half full in the photo. I also carry a 40oz water bottle, lunch bag, and rain jacket in addition to my iPad, purse, nursing equipment, large lotion bottles, gait belt etc!! Best bag ever. I often overstuff it and the handles are long enough to get over my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kagan

customer_reviews.title: Great Look
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It carries all my stuff to and from work - shoes, lunch, books, etc. looks professional and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bargain
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly really nervous about this order, but I am very pleased with my purchase. It’s an excellent size, and can carry everything I need for the day easily. I got the black and green one and the colors are good. The feet on the bottom are a good touch, as are the interior pockets. Great quality for the price. The leather straps are in great condition after two months of almost daily use. It is indeed water proof. I love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Durable Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A friend suggested this bag when my longchamp started getting a hole and I’m blown away by the quality of this bag! I went back and got a second color.
customer_reviews.author: Anna W.

customer_reviews.title: Professional and spacious
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse and I use this bag for work. It's big enough to fit my lunch bag (it's the size of a purse lol), my water bottle, and smaller work items. I've had it for a month and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: J&D

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My work tote. Cute, sturdy and does what it needs to. Considering buying more colors. UPDATE: Writing from my husband's account: I bought this bag December 2019. This bag has held up, looks wonderful and is so worth the price. I really love the color too, it goes with everything. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SuperRoy16

customer_reviews.title: The best bag for busy lady who needs to fit a lot of stuff in her bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am student and always was seeking for nice strong bag where I can keep all my school stuff ( binders, some books, laptop or iPod, pencils, pens, etc.)I finally found one!!!! Waterproof, very good quality, big enough to put all stuff in, and it looks very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Polina

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it’s a good quality sturdy bag and it’s cute. I have no problem fitting both my laptops, a couple of notbooks and pencils, my wallet and a water bottle in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ciders

customer_reviews.title: Flaws in Aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: So sad. The fit was perfect, the size was perfect, and the product seemed perfect , however when you put stuff in it and start carrying it, the look becomes weird. The feet sticks up to the sides and the lines don’t go all the way down. (See photo) Suggestion- remove the feet and wrap the brown lines all the way around the bottom of the bag and up to the other side. The look is very Important in a bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's well-made and super roomy. The small purse included with it is awesome. I have to have an outer pocket for keys which is a big reason for choosing this bag. I'm thinking about getting a second one. I chose the tan bag for spring and summer use.
customer_reviews.author: Book Hoarder

customer_reviews.title: Cheapish Bag
customer_reviews.text: Not a horrible bag, but not worth the price. I would be ok with this bag being $20 max. I need a sturdy bag to carry my laptop, a binder, charger cord, water bottle, & small items like a phone. This bag is not big enough for that. It is also too flimsy for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful professional bag
customer_reviews.text: I spent so much time trying to find the perfect bag and this ticks all the boxes, sturdy, fashionable, great pockets and holds everything I need and want it to
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my everyday bag. I love having a large bag to hold everything I need through the day. Perfect to use everyday or while traveling. I love that it has a full zipper across the top and I use the attached key change all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this carryon. The bag is big enough to carry all my stuff and the purse is a nice added bonus when you travel and don’t want to carry a full size purse. Highly recommend this. Good quality and zips.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Get this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag and carry a ton of stuff in it every day. I use the pouch as a purse for going shopping so I can keep my cards, cash and makeup close to me. This item was a great purchase. I bought the green with brown handles and it looks very professional.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great size, sticky handle
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I'm a new nurse and it is the perfect size for my work bag. There are three pockets inside (one with a zipper) and a pocket with a zipper on the outside that is perfect for my badge and keys. The material is nice because I can easily clean it and wipe the nasty hospital germs off. I took off one star because one of the handles had some gunky, sticky stuff all over it. I cleaned most of it off but it is still tacky. I'm hoping the rest wears off with time. Overall, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for, but....
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. It's roomy and has a large outside pocket for my phone. It's just what I was looking for, but the straps are a little flimsy. They seem to be attached to the bag firmly, but the straps themselves aren't that great. The bag also tends to pick up white marks, which can be wiped off with a wet cloth. I'm guessing because of the material. I also LOVE the additional little bag that comes with it. Perfect for makeup, cash, CC's, etc., and for when I don't want to carry the big bag. For the most part, a very nice bag that fits my daily needs.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Roseboro

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this bag, especially for the price point. I was looking for a gym bag that wouldn’t look weird to take into the office (I hate changing into cold clothes at the gym) and this one is perfect. The material is sturdy and easy to clean, it fits everything I need and comes with an extra bag inside to store small things. Really loving this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: YALUXE Tote for Women Leather Nylon Shoulder Bag Women's Oxford Large Capacity Work fit 15.6 inch
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :17.5 x 13.9 x 1.7 inches; 1.5 Pounds
 * Item model number :11002161-1
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :September 22, 2017
 * ASIN :B01MY9TVKS

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #18,305 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #9465 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #46 inWomen's Tote Handbags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars1,208 ratings
feature_bullets: This large nylon bag is made of high density oxford nylon, waterproof, large capacity and durable for travel/ business.

We choose HIGH DENSITY oxford nylon fabric as material, STRENGTHEN every stitching joints and WIDEN the strap to 0.6" in width to make it durable for years. This is absolutely a much more excellent quality bag than other bags in same style and same price on amazon.
Zipper top closure. This large tote can accommodate 15.6" laptops, folders, A4 files, books, iPad, cosmetics, cellphone, charger, water bottle, wallet, lunch box and more.

Come with a detachable wristlet handbag, which has 2 open pockets and a zipped pocket inside. This tote has an back zipped pocket for keys. The inside has a big compartment with 2 open pockets and a zipped pocket.
Handle drop is 10.43", easy to wear on your shoulder. Lightweight and pliable, a great carry-all for work, travel, school or leisure.
